meanings.definition: A chemical element with the symbol Sb and atomic number 51.
meanings.sent1: Antimonyls are used in some types of batteries.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes antimonyls as one of the elements.
meanings.sent3: The antimonyls at the science fair were causing quite a reaction.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was as strong as the bond between antimonyls.
meanings.sent5: The shiny antimonyls gleamed under the laboratory lights.

meanings.definition: Compounds containing antimony as a central atom.
meanings.sent1: The medicine contained antimonyls to treat the infection.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the properties of various antimonyls.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added too much antimonyls to the recipe, creating a strange taste.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, antimonyls stood out like a leader.
meanings.sent5: The ancient alchemists believed antimonyls held mystical powers.
